content.query:
-- Create sensor View 
IF EXISTS(select * FROM sys.views where name = 'sensor_view')
    DROP VIEW IF EXISTS sensor_view;
GO
CREATE VIEW sensor_view AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'interim.sensor/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'INTERIM_Zone',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
AS [r];
GO
